-1.title: Alamo City Comic Con - Brimstone Interview

episode of.title: Punching the Walls of Reality (TV Series 2012â€“ )

-1.plot: PTWoR's Promethius met up with the head honcho of Hound Comics, a man who goes by the name of Brimstone; learning that Hound Comics has their fingers in everything from salsa, seasonings and Butterwinks cookies to comics, animation and children's literature. A Renaissance Man indeed.

imdb.plot outline: Often sophomoric yet witty humor, non sequitur, sprinkled with raunchy subject matter, and more than enough geek talk to tickle your inner nerd. We produce several candid and hilarious blogs with topics ranging from the latest in video games, most popular television shows, most loathed movies, mainstream comic books and highlights of the combat sport of mixed martial arts.
